taxon.author: (Rossi, 1790)
taxon.distribution: Europe, northern Africa, Jordan, Turkey, Ukraine, Russia (Europe), Georgia. Introduced to Brazil, Uruguay, Argentina

referenceObject.reference: Rossi, P. (1790). Fauna etrusca: sistens insecta quae in Provinciis Florentina et Pisana praesertim collegit. Tomus secundus. Thomae Masi & Sociorum, Liburni, pp. 126-140.
